# vastdata_protected_path (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "vastdata_protected_path" "protected_path1" {
  name = "protected_path1"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Read-Only

- `guid` (String) guid
- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
